description: This file defines a set of React components representing a UI Card component and its subcomponents (Header, Title, Description, Content, Footer). It exports these components for re-use in a React application, providing styling and structure for card UI elements.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: Main Card component, a stylized container with rounded borders and shadow.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: Subcomponent for the header section of the card, typically contains title or header content.

methods.name: CardTitle
methods.description: Subcomponent for the card's title, styled prominently.

methods.name: CardDescription
methods.description: Subcomponent for descriptive text within the card.

methods.name: CardContent
methods.description: Subcomponent for the main content area of the card.

methods.name: CardFooter
methods.description: Subcomponent for footer content within the card.
